import React from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' function Header(){ const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLog) const {userInfo} = userLogin const logoutHandler = () => { alert('logout') } return(
Ghuni Shop
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Log out ) : ( Login )}
) } export default Header
